1509880.name: Ponder
1509880.description:
Ponder is a exploration game with a friendly world with a lot of secrets to uncover.
Meet interesting characters and have good conversations, some of them will even give you new ideas that can be used to traverse more of the world, or just see it in a new light.

A metroidvania without any combat! A casual art game where you just explore and discover at your own pace.
1509880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
